order_modal_p1: You can order the map here, but initially, we need to know what to do. right?
order_modal_p2: Well, use our telegram & discord bots to start dialog with us. Initially you’ll be talking to our AI.
order_modal_p3: Don’t worry, he’s trained and knows everything, you can ask him about us and provide him your request!
hire_modal_p1: We’d like you to work with us, but we first, let’s talk!
